actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce and Agency Organization.
Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a real estate stock index investment option under the Thrift Savings Plan.
short_title: Real Estate Investment Thrift Savings Act

summary.text: Real Estate Investment Thrift Savings Act - Amends Federal law relating to the Federal Employees' Retirement System to provide for the establishment of a Real Estate Stock Investment Fund under the Thrift Savings Plan.

titles.title: Real Estate Investment Thrift Savings Act
Real Estate Investment Thrift Savings Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a real estate stock index investment option under the Thrift Savings Plan.
